description: DST spring-forward coverage for America/New_York on 2025-03-09.

events.title: Daily 9am standup
events.note: Pre-shift: EST (UTC-05:00) still in effect; recompute should stay at 09:00 local.

events.title: Daily 9am standup
events.note: Post-shift: EDT (UTC-04:00) applies; 9am meeting must remain 09:00 local after conversion.
